TITLE: Authentic Assessment
DEF: Assessment tasks that replicate real-world scenarios
TASK: The Authentic Assessment pattern fosters the evaluation of learners through tasks that mimic real-world scenarios. It seeks to assess students' abilities to apply their learning in realistic contexts, addressing assessments that lack real-world relevance. To create an engaging and effective evaluation of student learning, educators should design authentic tasks that align with curriculum goals and provide clear criteria for success.
